title: Master Yi + Sated Devourer + BotRK + Wit's End + Last Whisper
body:
This is just OP.

I don't care what anyone says, this is insane attack speed, every attack does 16% of target's current health + 125 to 179 physical damage + 214 magic damage(Devourer now only goes to 65 magic damage right?), and every 3rd attack does 32% of the target's current health + 85 to 139 physical damage + 428 magic damage.

I don't even need to write specifics and I'm not going to, because anyone who says this isn't OP is crazy.

"Oh but you have to get 30 stacks first"
Oh but its also a get-out-of-jail-free-card
Even if you're down 0-100 and have no towers, once a Master Yi gets this he can fucking solo carry by 2-3 shotting everyone who comes in his way, tanks included, within seconds due to his crazy-ass attack speed and passive.

Have a jungle Master Yi on the enemy team? Is he building like this? Well say goodbye to your tushies unless you can end before he gets this build because then he's fucking unstoppable. Oh, not to mention any defense he might have, which he still has room for two more items. So, say, against an MR team, Spirit Visage, against an AD team, Randuin's Omen, and no matter what just grab a Guardian Angel and you'll be unbeatable. They got a lot of CC? Replace Spirit Visage or Randuin's with a Mercurial Scimitar, its just that much more damage and you can remove all CC affects currently on you. Heck, if they aren't building armor you can just build it in place of Last Whisper.

I really can't imagine anyone defending this. I mean really, 16% of the target's current health plus all that extra several hundred damage in both forms of physical and a bit of magic so armor doesn't affect it, every some 0.5 seconds at only 1 attack speed, and with all this AS it'll probably be about 2 so one of these about every 0.25 seconds, and every 3rd hit deals 32% and all that extra magic damage x2, plus the extra physical damage x2, and whammo.

"Oh but you can build Thornmail"
Oh but you can do that for almost any AD champ. And I don't think Thornmail actually affects the BotRK passive since it isn't actual AD and is just an on-hit effect, so its basically returning some 37 to 53 damage back to him every hit and giving them 100 armor, only 65 with the Last Whisper, even less with other armor pens such as runes and masteries, plus there's the magic damage from Wit's End and Devourer that isn't affected by it.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Coriandr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q1UULw7u,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-09T04:07:25.457+0000)
>
> I don't care what anyone says, this is insane attack speed, **every attack** does....

If I recall, Sated only doubles the on-hits on every *other* attack, not *every* attack.

> And I don't think Thornmail actually affects the BotRK passive since it isn't actual AD and is just an on-hit effect

All armor reduces BotRK's health shred, because it is dealt as additional *physical* damage. Therefore, Thornmail **alone** means you only take 4% current health instead of 8%. And that's not considering any other base or bonus stats.

> [{quoted}](name=Kouga,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q1UULw7u,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-07-09T10:21:08.151+0000)
>
> If I recall, Sated only doubles the on-hits on every *other* attack, not *every* attack.

Ah, apparently it is. I never read that. Was it recently added to nerf it before official release?
Either way though, this is insane attack speed, dealing about 8% on the first hit, 16% on the second(Sated), 16%(Double Strike), 16%(Sated), and then just repeating itself for 16% every hit with insane attack speed without even the ult being on, and probably max(2.5) attack speed with it, plus his Q waveclear and juking, plus his W for healing and damage reduction.

> All armor reduces BotRK's health shred, because it is dealt as additional *physical* damage. Therefore, Thornmail **alone** means you only take 4% current health instead of 8%. And that's not considering any other base or bonus stats.

And Last Whisper reduces it to 65 armor. Armor pen. reduces it even further and you'll probably come out with about 50-ish armor from Thornmail, then your base armors. So yes, it will be reduced to maybe 12-14% current health damage, but it'll still be a fuck load.

> Ah, apparently it is. I never read that. Was it recently added to nerf it before official release?

Has always been every second attack.

> [{quoted}](name=R110,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q1UULw7u,comment-id=000a00000000,timestamp=2015-07-09T13:22:24.913+0000)

You positive? I never noticed it. Hmm. Guess its just me being blind again, lol.
Meh, I'd rather crit.
Release Feral Flare all over again.

the moment you pick yi, just focus him and don't be behind and boom

also, while yi is farming just pick {{champion:107}}  gank everywhere, and oneshot yi later if he does this build
One shoot yi with rengar? BITCH PLEASE, master yi will kill rengar BEFORE HE WILL LAND ON HIM.

I won't even response to this https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yW_st2H2Y2Y

now shut the fck up

> [{quoted}](name=ZoumeroBiftekaki,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q1UULw7u,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-07-09T09:10:56.984+0000)

You do realize that there are these things called "defensive items", right?
Plus, defensive playstyle. Let your tanks engage, then at the right time, go in and when something bad is about to happen, press Q if you can juke it, or press W if you can't and need to heal and reduce the damage. If needed just get the fuck out of there but you'll probably get at the very least two kills/assists in that fight.
a melee squishy without an escape move should never survive a teamfight. stun him for 2 seconds and hes dead.

> [{quoted}](name=ZoumeroBiftekaki,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q1UULw7u,comment-id=000800010000,timestamp=2015-07-09T14:41:56.122+0000)
>
> a melee squishy without an escape move should never survive a teamfight. stun him for 2 seconds and hes dead.

Assuming he doesn't juke the stun. Any slows don't matter, he can juke most types of things with his Q(though he has to use it right or else waste it), and he can W to heal up and ignore some damage. Plus, you're acting like its going to be Yi vs Enemy team, its gonna be Ally team vs Enemy team, and Yi will be included, so they'll have just as much CC. Probably. Unless its a shitty team comp.
he can't juke auto attack, he can't juke {{champion:107}}  burst, he can't juke {{champion:33}}  taunt+all his reflecting damage

you do realize that this build sucks though right? IE + PD still doing way more. Can't wait to play against all the retards like you who think sated devourer existing means stacking up with shitty on-hit proccing items builds.

> [{quoted}](name=SquishyArchon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q1UULw7u,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-09T08:53:17.345+0000)

Can't wait to see all the retards like you completely ignoring the whole purpose of sated devourer and build a full squishy crit build, get one-shot as always and not benefit of the item at all.
PS : crit builds synergize better with {{item:3072}} than {{item:3153}} .
Sated devourer is all about the on-hit. And since on-hit work well with 2-3 items and it's even enhanced with sated devourer, you can melt anyone, build 2 tanky items and be very hard to burst while having around 60-70% of the damage of a crit Yi (more like 50% against carries but 80-90% against tanks)

> [{quoted}](name=Sasogwa,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q1UULw7u,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-07-09T09:03:59.402+0000)

Holy shit you and the people who upvoted you are fucking retards. Where in the OP's original build did he buy a single tank item? You think wit's end makes him not squishy? The whole point was that he put down a glass cannon item build but a shitty one at that just because he (and apparently you too) thinks that sated devourer means stack on hit items you normally wouldn't buy.

Newsflash, there was nothing stopping a Yi from building tanky before Sated devourer already. You could easily have gone Jungle Item, Boots, IE, PD, and 2 tank items. Just like you can now. And just like you can with sated devourer. If you're still buying 2 tanky items, I can guarantee you that loading up on idiotic stuff like wit's end will severely gimp your damage, especially considering Yi would already either hit the attack speed cap or come very close to it with devourer and one attack speed item already while in ult.

Also you just randomly vomit percentages out of your asshole like it's fact.

Well I'm not a fan of {{item:3091}} myself, but the fact it's doubled makes it relatively decent.
Anyway, a build like {{item:3931}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3035}} + 2 defensive items or situationally {{item:3072}} just does the job.
(PS : OP just said he could have 2 tanky items (well he somehow forgot boots). And stacked wit's end gives quite an amount of mr.)

IE + PD just has 0 synergy with sated devourer whatsoever. You lose on the powerspike of {{item:3153}} so you're kinda weak midgame. You have 0 lifesteal and base your damage on crit autoattacks and not on-hits so thornmail kinda fucks you up.

Yesterday I had a game as Nasus against Yi, he built {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3035}} {{item:3933}} {{item:3153}} .
In death recap I received more true damage than physical. Around 950 true ; 900 physical. Like, 3 items for a crit build < Yi's E boosted by sated devourer. Pretty damn crazy.
Ofc I was a tank so it's normal that it's reduced but still (and he had lw).

Yea the new jungle item is going to need some tuning. I'm still really excited to play Aatrox with it tho, so I'll just perma-ban Master Yi. 

Also, does anyone know why the new patch hasn't been released yet? Usually it's the day after they post the notes, but I still haven't had to update anything. Maybe they're tuning the Devourer 1 more time?

Its not the item that needs tuning, it's Yi.

Nerf Yi and he is more balanced with Sated and on par with everyone else.

Nerf Sated and Yi is still better with it than literally everyone else.

Yeah, nerf Yi and he is forced into building sated devourer. Then remove sated devourer and Yi is weak as hell for the Rest of the time this game exists because nobody likes him so nobody will ask for buffing him like they do with Elise, Zyra, etc.
Devourer sucks on Yi.. it doesent proc any of his passives unless its a bug.
It increases his passive stack generation and doubles true damage active every other AA.

he is right, i just tested this
.... IT's weaker than the Crit build... Also late game people can blow Yi as fast as he can blow them,  only offtank Yi - BORK+Ghostblade + 3 tank items can survive any farmed champions.
Yea, and forget the fact you could take this one stupid item to replace USELESS crit items on him.

Forget Last Whisper, just get Zephyr. With his true damage, he can indiscriminately kill everything, all he needs is to get in range.

With his [W] attack reset, he can skip straight to the second attack and deal double procs with almost every hit.

> [{quoted}](name=FantasySniper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=q1UULw7u,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-09T05:54:14.060+0000)
>

> 
> With his [W] attack reset, he can skip straight to the second attack and deal double procs with almost every hit.

Only good stat Zephyr gives is attack speed and you are already nearly capped with botrk+sated+ult
Last whisper is millions times better than Zephyr damage-wise, because it tremendously increases the damage on-hit from botrk and allows you to destroy tanks that much easier.

Also, you talk about W auto-attack reset, but you know that it is less effective the most attack speed you have? Doing an auto-attack reset when you have 2.5 attack speed is quite useless.

If you have 2.5 AS, you're only attacking once every 0.4 seconds, so the tiny animation cancel time is still faster. Not that he reaches that cap anyways, since at most it's little above 2.0 AS full build.

Zephyr also gives MS, CDR, and Tenacity, all things that make Yi much more of a threat. Although armor is still a big deal, you're already immune to the AS slows, so why bother trying to counter the stat when you can just increase your hybrid damage and true damage procs?

But you're basically buying Merc Treads value for 2850g. This is very expensive, I'd rather buy more sustain, more damage or more tankiness.
Well idk if you build {{item:3006}} , I personnally build {{item:3111}}  cause I already got so much attack speed (AS reds+quints + devourer + botrk) so I already have the tenacity.
Normally I build Greaves or Ninja Tabi. Although it normally depends on whether or not I'm going for a whole damage build with Skirmisher's or need the tank since I have to get Stalker's.
No need, his attacks speed should be just about capped with his ult + bortk + wits + devourer.

I played as Cassiopeia, there was an enemy yi jungler, I was not extremely fed but I was actually ahead in lane with pretty good farm. Yi would just run to me with his ult and save his Q for when I casted my ult to avoid it, there was absolutely NO WAY that I could 1v1 him even when I hit him with the ult, he had this build and a banshee's veil, so he would resist my damage and of course blow me away in 2 fucking seconds. I thought Cassiopeia was a very very good duelist, but yi just f*cked me over very easily, just Q and AA, that's it. What kind of counterplay does he have besides some specific itemization like Thornmail? No carry will ever build a freaking thornmail.
{{item:3009}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3046}}{{item:3046}}{{item:3046}}{{item:3046}} will forever be my favorite yi build

I just went sated, BoTRk and then banshee, randuins and zeal(into phantom) and literally started 3 shooting ppl  and got a quadra, wasn't even fed just was like 3/2 they surrender before i could pentaâ€¦ its just way too OP on Yi and could use my q over and over again to avoid cc

>Even if you're down 0-100 and have no towers, once a Master Yi gets this he can fucking solo carry by 2-3 shotting everyone who comes in his way, tanks included, within seconds due to his crazy-ass attack speed and passive.

>damage in both forms of _**physical**_ and a bit of magic so armor doesn't affect it

So armor no longer affects physical damage? Call the presses people! Sarcasm aside, just make {{item:3075}}. It prevents him from going full glass cannon and makes him have to build something like either a {{item:3139}}, {{item:3072}}, or {{item:3065}} which really isn't optimal for him.

And sated still isn't going to improve his squishiness
I feel like the best build would be a tanky onhit build. Something like {{item:3718}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3022}}.
In b4 protect the smite kog maw 1000% win rate.
